name: AX2012ModelstoreSet
friendlyName: AX 2012 Model Store - Set install mode
description: Sets a flag in the model store that indicates the action to take when a model has been modified
author: SDK4NET.de

inputs.name: configurationFileName
inputs.label: Server config file path (.axc)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the server configuration file.

inputs.name: installMode
inputs.label: Install mode
inputs.helpMarkDown: What state should the install mode of the ax 2012 model store set?

instanceNameFormat: SDK4NET.de - AX 2012 Model Store - Set install mode: $(configurationFileName)
